field.name: description
field.value:
This has been discussed on the mailing list and is a bit of a thorny issue. My proposed implementation is available here:
http://github.com/patearl/Castle.ActiveRecord/commit/4871f17c1e57426eec23a4a683738d5f781794b4

comment.author: patearl
comment.text: This new commit replaces the original: http://github.com/patearl/Castle.ActiveRecord/commit/d5e4b07c6ab1aec3953410a36d0b81196e4746c4

comment.author: patearl
comment.text: Okay, after learning much more about Git, I put this in its final location on this feature branch: https://github.com/patearl/Castle.ActiveRecord/commits/client-profile

comment.author: henry
comment.text:
Hi Patrick,
Is the build working for the client profile?

comment.author: patearl
comment.text: Though I can't confirm that it would work on the build server, and with the note that it doesn't have conditional compilation to build a non-CP version, the solution does indeed build out of the box for me.

comment.author: henry
comment.text: This patch is incomplete. It lacks the net40cp libs and build config for the target framework, also the build for the net35 is broken.
